description: Tools for automated web browsing, content extraction, and web page interaction

tools.name: browse_web
tools.description: Fetch and display content from a specified web page.

url.description: The web address (URL) of the page to be accessed.

tools.name: click_element
tools.description: Simulates a mouse click on a specified web element.

selector.description: A valid CSS selector to identify the web element to be clicked.

page_id.description: A unique identifier for the page containing the web element.

tools.name: get_page_content
tools.description: Extracts the textual content and metadata from a specified web page.

url.description: The complete URL of the web page from which content will be extracted.
